frontmatter.title: StepsLayout
frontmatter.description: The container component for layout with separate steps and step indicator. Adds the required context to make step navigation work.

frontmatter.title: Step
frontmatter.description: Each step should be wrapped with a `StepsLayout.Step` component directly inside StepsLayout.

frontmatter.title: NextButton
frontmatter.description: `StepsLayout.NextButton` connects to the `StepsContext` to move the user to the next step when clicked.

frontmatter.title: useStep
frontmatter.description: `StepsLayout.useStep` connects to the `StepsContext` to handle step related operations.

frontmatter.title: PreviousButton
frontmatter.description: `StepsLayout.PreviousButton` connects to the `StepsContext` to move the user to the previous step when clicked.

frontmatter.title: Buttons
frontmatter.description: `StepsLayout.Buttons` Is a composition for a row containing both PreviousButton and NextButton.
